div.h2: COVID-19 NO SCHOOL or Activities until April 24, 2020.

div.p: "As our country, state, and community continue to analyze and address the spread of the COVID-19(Coronavirus), our districts have continued to monitor our local situation....
School closing information - Two page letter from Superintendent

div.div: Thu, Apr 30 - Fri, May 1 , 9:00 AM - 2:00 PM

div.p: As the news of positive COVID-19 cases continues to grow here in Dexter, we feel as a school district that it is necessary to close the track, football field and tennis courts effective immediately.

The Stoddard County Superintendents have been in regular contact regarding this (Covid-19)pandemic. During a recent meeting, and after reviewing information from multiple sources including consulting with the Stoddard County Health Department and Stoddard County Emergency Management Agency, the decision has been made to extend our current COVID-19 Wellness Break until April 24, 2020.

MEALS ON BUSES Updated delivery locations for "Meals on Buses" 10:30 - 12:30: Central Elementary; 11:00 - 11:30: Dudley Store, Calvary Baptist Church at 205 S Cora Street, Old Casey's Building at East Bus 60, Public Water #1 Office at 3 Mile Road and Apple Blossom Ln.; 11:30 - 12:00: Orscheln's Parking Lot, Apple Court/Peach Court at N Locust Street, UAW Hall Building at Park Lane and Houston Street.

Due to the recent outbreak of COVID-19 the Dexter R-XI School District will close from Wednesday March 18 through Friday April 3. All school activities, events and practices will be canceled during the closure. All campus facilities will be closed. Check back for updates on meals.

Kindergarten Screenings will be shifted to new dates. Those scheduled for March 26 will now be screened on April 30, and those scheduled for March 27th will now be on May 1st. The same time appointment time will be held for these screenings at Southwest Elementary. Appointments are available from February 24 to March 20th by calling 614-1015 ext 1201. Children must be 5 years old before August 1, 2020

Dexter R-XI School District
